About 11 Aberdeen St Unit 4

Open House: Sun. 4/21 from 12-1:00 PM. Nice quiet two bedroom condominium in a great location. Large modern kitchen with stainless steel appliances (dishwasher, electric stove, refrigerator, & microwave) and a very large pantry. Unit also features hardwood floors throughout with 2 large bedrooms (carpeting in the primary bedroom & hardwood floors in the other) and a nice modern bathroom. Common laundry in basement. Just steps away to restaurants, the Landmark Center, and public transportation (Fenway stop on the D line). Very convenient to Boston University. Leased until 8/31/2024 at $3,350/month.
